website_summaries.verdict: Infused with ingredients that minimize scarring and skin ailments.
pros: Simple and subtle, this oil is a safe starter for those new to pure oil products
Customers rave about increases in skin volume
We love that it doesn't overpower your natural oil production
cons: A few customers noted that the bottle may leak somewhat

customer_reviews.title: Too Oily!!!
customer_reviews.text: Grapeseed oil is supposed to absorb into your skin quickly and not leave a oily residue behind. Well this product is the opposite it left my skin oily. The description says coldpressed on the bottle it says refined grapeseed oil. I just I’ll be purchasing another brand that is unrefined grapeseed oil.
customer_reviews.author: Calk

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I started using this all over my face and neck area at night and my skin absolutely loves it. It has definitely minimized my fine lines and wrinkles, especially around my eyes. Forget the super expensive face creams, this product does a much better job at a fraction of the price. I will use this FOREVER!!
customer_reviews.author: George's mom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing on my skin!
customer_reviews.text: I really needed something for my hands, arms, and legs, My skin gets super, especially in the 100+ summers here. Add in nursing, and I was pretty much a dry husk. but I also have super sensitive skin. Most everything makes me break out, and holding my baby all the time, I needed to be extra careful. This grape seed oil is PERFECT! It provided the moisturizing I needed for my dried and cracking skin while not causing me to break out. It is also super light weight and non greasy. I actually think my skin looks younger after a few weeks. I little goes a long way too, so you definitely get your moneys worth with a bottle.
customer_reviews.author: KhaosF

customer_reviews.title: I use this instead of lotion
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this really moisturizes my skin & makes it feel softer. This is so much healthier to use rather than commercial lotions that are full of toxic chemicals. It soaks in pretty well after a few minutes. I definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Nicole

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to help diminish the slight dark circles ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help diminish the slight dark circles under my eyes. Maybe it's the oil in my eye, but my undereyes look lighter to me Update: Didn't realize I had already left a review, but I came here to say that I love grapeseed oil! Apparently I thought this would help lighten my undereyes? -Shrug- Anyway, I mix ~60% Grapeseed oil with ~40% Neem oil and apply 5-7 drops of that mixture AM and PM. Grapeseed oil's high linoleic acid content has really helped my skin not get so clogged up. If I don't put enough grapeseed oil into my mixture, I feel like I can tell. Definitely will keep using grapeseed oil!
customer_reviews.author: Baby Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Great for massaging! & Essential oils!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Grapeseed oil! I use it in my massage oils and I only use the best for my clients! It doesn’t leave an oily residue like some others do! I’m very faithful to this brand & they are affordable. I also use it in sprays I make with my essential oils it’s great for daluteing essential oils!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Kingery

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing. I purchased this to help heal a bruise/ ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I purchased this to help heal a bruise/ discoloring on my leg due to a fall. The damage on my leg had been there for months. I ordered this oil in hopes that it was clear the bruise/ discoloration and it did just that!! Within weeks. I was so impressed, anytime I hear of someone needing an excellent therapeutic oil, the Grapeseed Oil is wonderful! 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great face moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I got this product after reviewing what oils were best for the face. It turns out to be grapeseed oil. This product was a terrific price point for me. I've used it for a few months and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Quality
customer_reviews.text: The lightweight feel of the oil as well as its ability to moisturize my scalp without leaving a greasy buildup or greasy/oily after feel was amazing. I truly enjoyed this product.

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: This Grapeseed oil is lightweight and great for the hair and skin. My entire family benefits from its use. I like the Honey Dew brand because their oil is lighter than some of the other brands.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!!! Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I have combination skin so it is really all over the place and this moisturized my skin very well but was light weight at the same time. I also have to be really picky about the products I use on my face and I’ve had trouble finding something that was really moisturizing but didn’t irritate my skin. This product was exactly that! Left my skin so soft, evened out my skin tone and left me glowing! Did not irritate my skin at all probably because it is 100% pure grape seed oil! Great quality product!

customer_reviews.title: This oil acts like collagen on my skin and causes volume to reappear
customer_reviews.text: I am big fan of argan oil, but grape seed is now the bomb. This oil acts like collagen on my skin and causes volume to reappear. The first time I used it I noticed the volume and thought whattt; everytime I use this oil (which is everyday) the volume is there. I am a young 62 and am fortunate that most people think I am at least ten years younger when they meet me. Don't write many reviews unless I find a stellar product and this is one of those products. Pretty good deal price wise for the results and lasts a long time. Hope you try this oil so you will have the same fantastic results.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT grape seed EXTRACT. This is plain grape seed oil
customer_reviews.text: The item description literally says “Grape seed oil extract”. So obviously I thought I was buying extract. Regular grape seed oil is cheap, I could get twice this amount for this price. I also already have 2 bottles. The description is deceptive. I should have researched the product more but was in a hurry so this is partly my fault. BUT the company really needs to change the description, it’s blatantly deceptive.

product_meta.title: Pure Grape Seed Oil Extract Cold Pressed Extraction Moisturizing Antioxidant Oil for Skin Hair and Nails Great for Massage Anti Aging Face Moisturizer Hair Serum With Vitamins E C D for Women and Men
feature_bullets: 100% PURE GRAPE SEED OIL cold-press grape seed oil is perfect for hair skin or nails. It contains high grade powerful vitamins E C D that not only hydrate and moisturize the skin but also help to heal and regenerate it as well. This makes it great for anti-aging sensitive skin hyper pigmentation acne scars acne psoriasis sunburns and stretchmarks. This premium natural high grade grape seed oil will leave your skin and hair smooth soft and supple. Now who doesn't want that?

AMAZING SKIN BENEFITS Smooth and soft skin is something we are all after but after a certain age it can be more difficult to achieve. Fine lines wrinkles age spots and uneven skin texture can keep our skin from looking its best. Emollient grape seed oil face moisturizer contains polyphenols and linoleic fatty acids as well as vitamins E C D which all work together to retain moisture and hydration in the skin and keep it looking fresh even smooth and radiant.

MAKES HAIR HEALTHY SHINY AND SOFT Ultra hydrating grape seed oil is extremely hydrating which makes it perfect for your hair care routine. It can difficult to get enough hydration in your hair. Natural grape seed oil is extremely emollient and moisturizing making it perfect for dry hair scalp or nails. Apply it as a hydrating hair mask or hair conditioner. This Grape seed extract oil helps mitigate the drying effect o styling products such as hairs spay gel mousse or serums.

THERAPEUTIC GRADE MASSAGE OIL therapeutic grade Grape seed oil makes an extremely effective massage oil because of how emollient it is. Apply this aromatherapy massage oil for a massage that will relieve stress aches pains and muscle sores while leaving your skin soft and smooth. Its thin texture and non-greasy feel make it a perfect non messy massage oil that will leave you feeling refreshed rejuvenated and revived.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE This Grapeseed oil is all natural and contains no impurities or fillers. It is also non greasy and has a low comdegegenicity which means it will not block pores and cause acne .Apply our pure Grape Seed Oil to your skin or use as carrier oil. Perfect for Men Women and Teens. Your purchase is guaranteed by our hassle-free 100% Money-Back Guarantee
